persistence

Interface IPlugin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataFilePlugin, SQLitePlugin

    public interface IPlugin
    This will need to be updated. But I figured we could start making the interfaces we would be using.
    Author:
    Craig Call

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        void addUser(User user)
        Adds the supplied user to the persistent store
        Parameters:

      • getRegisteredUsers

        List<User> getRegisteredUsers()
        Gets the users that have been registered with this persistent store
        Returns:
        the users that this store has had registered

      • getGames

        List<IGame> getGames()
        Gets the games that have been saved to this persistent store
        Returns:
        the games that have been saved

      • getCommandsForGameId

        List<ICommand> getCommandsForGameId(Integer gameId)
        Gets the commands for game by the id.
        Parameters:
        gameId - the gameId to get the commands for
        Returns:
        the commands for gameId

      • addCommandToGame

        void addCommandToGame(ICommand command,
                      IGame game)
        Adds the command to the game. This will keep up to n commands, as specified in the constructor. A snapshot of the game will be made every n commands.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to add. If null then we will assume this is a new game and will save it as a new game
        Igame - the game to add the command to

        void updateGame(IGame game)
